statements: SELECT * FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone1_status = 'Complete'
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM project_timelines ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, milestone2_date, milestone2_status FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone2_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone1_status, milestone2_status, milestone3_status FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone1_date IS NOT NULL AND milestone3_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE end_date > start_date ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, milestone1_date, milestone2_date, milestone3_date FROM project_timelines WHERE milestone1_status = 'complete' AND milestone2_status = 'in-progress';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers
SELECT name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE role='Developer'
SELECT id, email FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, due_date FROM ProjectMilestones WHERE completed=true
SELECT id, name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProjectMilestones WHERE project_id = 5 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Developer' AND email LIKE '%@company.com%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM ProjectMilestones WHERE completed = true AND due_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY due_date;
SELECT id, role, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_projects;
SELECT project_name, team_lead FROM team_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT member_id, member_name, project_name FROM team_members JOIN team_projects ON team_members.project_id = team_projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM team_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM team_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT t.project_id, t.project_name, COUNT(m.milestone_id) as milestone_count FROM team_projects t LEFT JOIN project_milestones m ON t.project_id = m.project_id GROUP BY t.project_id;

SELECT m.milestone_id, m.project_id, m.milestone_name, m.milestone_date, p.project_name FROM project_milestones m JOIN team_projects p ON m.project_id = p.project_id WHERE m.milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name, role FROM team_members;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM team_members;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id, due_date FROM milestones WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, project_name FROM milestones m JOIN projects p ON m.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM team_members WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'developer';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status FROM Tasks WHERE status IN ('pending', 'in progress');
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM Milestones WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT task_name, status FROM Tasks WHERE status='Pending'
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE role='Manager'
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM Milestones WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01'
